plot: Known as "Fantasma Rojo" (Red Ghost), Havana-refugee Miguel Mármol reflects on his life as an activist in El Salvador and the day he survived a firing squad when taken as dead.
title: Fantasma rojo
plot_es: Known as "Fantasma Rojo" (Red Ghost), Havana-refugee Miguel Mármol reflects on his life as an activist in El Salvador and the day he survived a firing squad when taken as dead.
plot_en: Known as "Fantasma Rojo" (Red Ghost), Havana-refugee Miguel Mármol reflects on his life as an activist in El Salvador and the day he survived a firing squad when taken as dead.

produce.name: Escuela Internacional de Cine y Televisión (EICTV)
